startInfo: This text appears when you press /start for the first time
addonInfoText: Your contacts and accounts in social networks. You can also leave information about yourself
autoSendText: This section is for automatically replying to users when they write a message to the bot.

description.title: Redirecting orders to the Telegram group. If you want notifications about new orders from your store to be sent to a specific telegram group, follow the steps below:
description.step1: Add your bot to the group and give admin rights
description.step2: Copy this token: <1>{{token}}</1> and send to the group
description.step3: The bot will understand that you want to set up notifications and will respond

lang.title: Language
lang.langText: For additional convenience of users of the bot, you can make it multilingual.

delivery.title: Delivery

placeholders.delivery_custom_text: For example: Delivery is carried out by the Millenium taxi service and is paid separately

delivery.mapDescription: When customers place an order, we determine the distance between the customer and you based on the address you enter on this card.

reload.title: Restart the bot
reload.text: In this section, you can restart the bot without any data being affected.

stop.title: Stop the bot
stop.text: In this section, you can stop the bot without affecting any data.

delete.title: Delete bot
delete.text: Please note that if you delete the bot, all data (categories, products, users, etc.) will be deleted.

instruction.title: Instruction
instruction.command: Use the <1>/newbot</1> command to create a new bot
instruction.message: In response, @BotFather will send a token like: <1>238279964:AAFE6-1ZuCAcEOUPa63XlLxxq9qYU1iYdbs</1>
instruction.name: Enter it in the field.
